info.title: Kassalapp
info.description: This API documentation is meant to be used by OpenAI ChatGPT.

get.summary: Checks if the Kassalapp API is working

get.description: Returns a list of all labels

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter labels by the 'name' and 'display_name' fields

get.description: Useful for finding a grocery store by name, location or based on the group (grocery store chain), returns name, address, contact information and opening hours for each store.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Perform a search based on a keyword.

parameters.name: km
parameters.description: Search radius in kilometers for proximity search.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description:
The number of results to be displayed per page.
Must be an integer between 1 and 100.

get.description: Finds a grocery store by ID. returns name, address, contact information and opening hours for the store store.
Useful for searching for groceries and various product to find the price, ingredients and nutritional information

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort the products by a specific criteria.
Available options: date_asc, date_desc, name_asc, name_desc, price_asc, price_desc.

parameters.name: has_labels
parameters.description:
Only return products with the matching labels, the value is an array of label names (eg: euroleaf, frysevare).
Each element must be a string.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search for products based on a keyword, this only applies to "name" of a product
The keyword must be a string with a minimum length of 3 characters.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description:
The number of products to be displayed per page.
Must be an integer between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: unique
parameters.description: If true, the product list will be collapsed based on the EAN number of the product; in practice, set this to true if you don't want duplicate results.

parameters.name: exclude_without_ean
parameters.description: If true, products without an EAN number are excluded from the results.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: Filter products by store (e.g., SPAR_NO, MENY_NO, KIWI).

parameters.name: excl_allergens
parameters.description:
Exclude specific allergens from the products.
Each element must be a string.

parameters.name: incl_allergens
parameters.description:
Include only specific allergens in the products.
Each element must be a string.

get.description: Gets a specific product by id, returns the product price, nutritional information, ingredients, allergens for the product.
Gets a specific product by EAN (barcode) number, returns the product price, nutritional information, ingredients, allergens for the product.
Will look up product information based on an URL, returns the product price, nutritional information, ingredients, allergens for the product.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The url of the Product you want to get information on.

get.description: Will look up product information based on an URL, and return all matching prices from other stores that stock that item.
get.summary: Find product price comparison info by URL

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The url of the Product you want to get comparisons for.

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description:
Only return categories that are direct children of the given parent_id.
AKA: get the children of a specific category.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search for categories based on a keyword, this only applies to "name" of a category.
The keyword must be a string with a minimum length of 3 characters.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description:
The number of categories to be displayed per page.
Must be an integer between 1 and 100.

get.description: Gets a specific product category by id, returns the category name, parent category, and depth.
Retrieves a collection of shopping lists associated with the authenticated user.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter shopping lists by searching the title

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Use include=items to include the shopping list items in the response

post.description: Creates a new shopping list for the authenticated user based on the provided data.

patch.description: Updates the data of a specific shopping list owned by the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes a specific shopping list owned by the authenticated user.

post.description:
Add an item to an existing shopping list by id, specify the product id and an optional "text" field,
in the kassalapp website the "text" field is simply the product name, but in the API it does not have to be that,
it can also be left blank if not required.

patch.description: Update an item in the shopping list, you can change the "text", or the "checked" field.
patch.summary: Update an item in the shopping list

delete.description: Removes an item from the shopping list by id.

get.description: Retrieves a collection of webhooks associated with the authenticated user.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter webhooks by searching the name or url

post.description:
Create and store a new webhook associated with the authenticated user.
Use the provided data from the request to set the webhook's properties.

patch.description:
Update the properties of an existing webhook based on the provided request data.
Ensure that the webhook to be updated belongs to the authenticated user.

delete.description:
Remove an existing webhook from the system.
Ensure that the webhook to be deleted belongs to the authenticated user.

contains.description:
contains
- YES - Contains the allergen
- NO - Does not contain the allergen
- UNKNOWN - There is no information available
- CAN_CONTAIN_TRACES - Can contain traces for the allergen

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
